Articles.Content:
Hello everyone first post here ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) some info first?

i started playing KSP like 2 Days ago and i've been trying to get to orbit and also Deep space i did manage it with Version 1 of Atlantis (i basicly call it that since i tried to look a bit like it.

Atlantis in the air:

> 
> 
> ![atlantisv1.png](http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/714/atlantisv1.png)

[Atlantis on the ground:](http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/atlantisv1.png/)

> 
> 
> ![atlantisgv1.png](http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/5738/atlantisgv1.png)

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/228/atlantisgv1.png/[(Those blue engines is a modified version of the Ion Thruster since i needed something to accualy be able to lift everything.. and i call them Impulse Drive's](http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/atlantisv1.png/)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/228/atlantisgv1.png/[)](http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/atlantisv1.png/)

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/228/atlantisgv1.png/[let me know what ya think. also this is only a version 1 i'll make other version as well.](http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/atlantisv1.png/)
